channel.title: Keyboard on I sudo X
channel.description: Recent content in Keyboard on I sudo X

item.title: 神器有价，情怀无价 —— HHKB
item.description: It’s to keyboards what Leica is to cameras; what Rimowa is to luggage; what Moleskine is to notebooks; what Rolls Royce is to cars; what Grey Goose is to vodka. Or at least, that’s the reputation it carries. If someone is discussing the “best mechanical keyboard”, it will be mentioned right away.
